name: 賀一平
objective: 本課程承續學生一年級的英文基礎，提供學生更多閱讀機會，並加強閱讀策略指導，以培養學生獨立閱讀、及使用適當英文表達之能力。教材以介紹英語地區文化、思想、及價值觀為主，以協助學生建立世界觀，並培養其批判思考能力。教學活動以團體討論、小組討論、段落與短文習作實施。
schedule:
Topics for Study and Discussion:
1st week: Orientation
2nd week: Cheating on your partner; Chatroom romance
3rd week: Old enough to be her grandparent; Cyber cheating
4th week: Legalizing Drugs
5th week: Addictions; Smoking; Too much to drink
6th week: Torture; Bribery and corruption
7th week: Nobody needs a gun; Gun control
8th week: Children who kill; Quiz
9th week: Mid-term Examination; Mid-term General English Proficiency Test;
10th week: Zodiac signs
11th week: Zodiac signs; the art of palmistry
12th week: Sexual harassment
13th week: Designer babies; Whose child
14th week: Cloning
15th week: You won the lottery
16th week: TV or not TV
17th week: Final Examination
18th week: Final General English Proficiency Test
scorePolicy:
Mid-term Exam: 10%
Mid-term General English Proficiency Test: 15%
Final General English Proficiency Test: 15%
Final Examination: 25%
Quizzes and Oral Presentations: 35%
materials:
Textbook
MacAnrew, R & Martinez, R. (2002). Taboos and issues. thomson/Heinle.
